description: The Restaking Vault, curated by InfStones, is designed to optimize restaking opportunities for its users. InfStones is a leading Web3 infrastructure platform, managing over 20,000 nodes spanning over 80 protocols; Trusted by Binance, OKX, Lido, Puffer, Swell, StakeStone, and numerous others
name: InfStones Restaked ETH
